name: Book warden
description:
This is my first mobile friendly game that I made, this is a game where you have to collect books to save the information.

This game was made for Godot 20 second game jam so this game will end extactly in 20 second.

How to controll
  • For mobile: There are buttons to move the character.
  • For Desktop: You can use A, left arrow, right arrow and D keys to move the character.

Credits are all in game.
